jcr:content.jcr:title: Virginia Association of Communication Arts and Sciences (VACAS)

contentheadline.headline: Virginia Association of Communication Arts and Sciences (VACAS)

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} The '''Virginia Association of Communication Arts and Sciences (VACAS)''' is the primary [[Virginia]] state organization for [[scholar]]s and [[professional]]s in the [[communication]] discipline. There are five divisions of the association: *Communication Education *Debate and Forensics *Interpersonal and Small Group Communication *Mass Media *Rhetoric and Communication Theory The association holds an annual [[business conference|conference]]. The 2004 conference was in [[Harrisonburg, Virginia]] from October 23 to 24. {{DEFAULTSORT:Virginia Association Of Communication Arts And Sciences (Vacas)}} [[Category:Organizations based in Virginia]] {{US-org-stub}} {{prof-assoc-stub}}
